title: Should schools close in term-time so families can afford holidays?
text:
The cost of some holidays will more than triple during the half term holidays. Last academic year some 16,000 parents were fined for taking pupils out of school during term-time. But latest figures show that next week the price for some holidays will be around Â£1,000 less than the following week when the schools break up.
